introduction.title: Privacy and Data Usage Policy
introduction.description: This policy describes how Innovation Expert AI handles data and user privacy. Our priority is to ensure maximum transparency and privacy protection.
introduction.noDataCollection: Data entered in the application is NOT acquired, stored, or used in any way by our system.

inputData.title: Input Data
inputData.description: When you enter a query or project description, this data is used exclusively to generate the requested analysis during the current session.

analysis.title: Analysis Process
analysis.description: Your data is processed in real-time using our proprietary methodology and case study databases. The analysis is generated instantly and is not saved.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: We do NOT store any personal data or project information. Each session is completely independent and data does not persist beyond the session duration.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.description: To provide the analysis service, we use external artificial intelligence services:

anthropic.title: Anthropic Claude AI
anthropic.description: We use Anthropic's API for AI processing. Data is processed according to Anthropic's privacy policies and is not permanently stored.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.noPersonalData: We do not collect personally identifiable data, so there is no need to request deletion or modifications
userRights.sessionBased: Each use of the application is session-based and does not maintain persistent history
userRights.transparency: We maintain complete transparency about processing procedures and methodologies used

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or data usage, you can contact Greco Technologies&Arts through official channels.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: This policy may be updated periodically to reflect any changes in the service.

alphaTesting.title: Alpha Testing Phase
alphaTesting.description: You are using Innovation Expert AI in Alpha Testing Phase. The system is completely operational and secure, but we are gathering feedback to optimize the user experience.

dataTransparency.title: Data Source Transparency
dataTransparency.description: Complete transparency on data sources used for analysis generation:
dataTransparency.proprietaryMethodology: Proprietary methodology based on 200+ verified case histories
dataTransparency.publicData: Public data and industry best practices
dataTransparency.noPersonalData: No personal or sensitive project data stored

vercelAnalytics.title: Vercel Analytics
vercelAnalytics.description: This application uses Vercel Analytics to monitor performance and improve user experience:
vercelAnalytics.errorTracking: Technical error tracking for system improvements
vercelAnalytics.noPersonalData: No personal data collection or user tracking
vercelAnalytics.aggregatedOnly: Only aggregated and anonymous usage statistics
